commands
info:
GET /sqlite/select or /sqlite/select_one
url parameter:
1. table_name (string)
2. where (json string) e.g.: 
[{
  col:"username", op:"like", val:"%test%", chain_op:"or"
},{...}]

POST /sqlite/create
x-www-form-url-encoded
1. table_name (string)
2. table_params (json string) e.g.: 
[{  
  col:"UserId", type:"integer", option:"NOT NULL UNIQUE" 
},{...}]

POST /sqlite/insert
x-www-form-url-encoded
1. table_name (string)
2. cols (json array) e.g.: [user_id, username]
3. vals (json array) e.g.: [1,'user_a']
